docstring: "A class that wraps an OGR Layer, needs to be instantiated from a DataSource object."
name: Layer

methods.docstring:
"""
        Initialize on an OGR C pointer to the Layer and the `DataSource` object
        that owns this layer.  The `DataSource` object is required so that a
        reference to it is kept with this Layer.  This prevents garbage
        collection of the `DataSource` while this Layer is still active.
        """
methods.name: __init__

methods.docstring: "Get the Feature at the specified index."
methods.name: __getitem__

methods.docstring: "Iterate over each Feature in the Layer."
methods.name: __iter__

methods.docstring: "The length is the number of features."
methods.name: __len__

methods.docstring:
"""
        Helper routine for __getitem__ that constructs a Feature from the given
        Feature ID.  If the OGR Layer does not support random-access reading,
        then each feature of the layer will be incremented through until the
        a Feature is found matching the given feature ID.
        """
methods.name: _make_feature

methods.docstring: "Return the extent (an Envelope) of this layer."
methods.name: extent

methods.docstring: "Return the name of this layer in the Data Source."
methods.name: name

methods.docstring: "Return the number of features in the Layer."
methods.name: num_feat

methods.docstring: "Return the number of fields in the Layer."
methods.name: num_fields

methods.docstring: "Return the geometry type (OGRGeomType) of the Layer."
methods.name: geom_type

methods.docstring: "Return the Spatial Reference used in this Layer."
methods.name: srs

methods.docstring:
"""
        Return a list of string names corresponding to each of the Fields
        available in this Layer.
        """
methods.name: fields

methods.docstring:
"""
        Return a list of the types of fields in this Layer.  For example,
        return the list [OFTInteger, OFTReal, OFTString] for an OGR layer that
        has an integer, a floating-point, and string fields.
        """
methods.name: field_types

methods.docstring: "Return a list of the maximum field widths for the features."
methods.name: field_widths

methods.docstring: "Return the field precisions for the features."
methods.name: field_precisions

methods.docstring:
"""
        Return a list containing the given field name for every Feature
        in the Layer.
        """
methods.name: get_fields

methods.docstring:
"""
        Return a list containing the OGRGeometry for every Feature in
        the Layer.
        """
methods.name: get_geoms

methods.docstring:
"""
        Return a bool indicating whether the this Layer supports the given
        capability (a string).  Valid capability strings include:
          'RandomRead', 'SequentialWrite', 'RandomWrite', 'FastSpatialFilter',
          'FastFeatureCount', 'FastGetExtent', 'CreateField', 'Transactions',
          'DeleteFeature', and 'FastSetNextByIndex'.
        """
methods.name: test_capability
